column4: Fresh install of 10.04 on an Inspiron 4000. Not seeing my wifi card, which worked with the last version of Ubuntu I used on this machine. How to get this working with minimal fuss?
plug in ethernet - do all updates, then check System / Admin / Hardware drivers

I can't post full dmesg output because the machine is not online. Card is a Tellus C100 (I Googled its FCC ID). What next? Network access not an option. I could copy files to the machine via USB key if needed.
it wasn't me who asked for dmesg output.  Without internet I can't help - hopefully someone else can.  Good luck.
